mapper.sql: contract, name, totalsupply, symbol, decimals, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ont_oep4 (contract, name, totalsupply, symbol, decimals, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime) values (#{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decimals,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tbl_ont_oep4
contract,
name,
totalsupply,
symbol,
decimals,
description,
contactinfo,
createtime,
auditflag,
updatetime,

mapper.update:
update tbl_ont_oep4
totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decimals = #{decimals,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_ont_oep4 set totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decimals = #{decimals,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select Contract, Symbol, Decimals from tbl_ont_oep4 where auditflag = 1

select a.contract as ContractHash, b.Name, a.TotalSupply, a.Symbol, a.Decimals, b.Description, b.ContactInfo, b.CreateTime, b.UpdateTime, b.Logo, b.ABI, b.Code, b.TxCount, b.Creator, b.Addresscount, b.OntCount, b.OngCount from tbl_ont_oep4 a, tbl_ont_contracts b where b.auditflag = 1 and a.Contract = b.contract order by Createtime asc limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}
select count(*) from tbl_ont_oep4 a,tbl_ont_contracts b where b.auditflag = 1 and a.Contract = b.contract
